math-lecture-1.title: Introduction to Calculus
math-lecture-1.subject: mathematics
math-lecture-1.description: Basic concepts of differential and integral calculus

sections.title: What is Calculus?
sections.content: Calculus is a branch of mathematics that deals with the study of change and motion. It is divided into two main branches: differential calculus and integral calculus.

sections.title: Historical Development
sections.content: The development of calculus is credited to two great mathematicians: Isaac Newton and Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz. Both developed the fundamental concepts independently in the late 17th century.

math-session-1.title: Calculus Problem Solving
math-session-1.subject: mathematics
math-session-1.description: Practical exercises and problem solving techniques

sections.title: Problem Solving Strategy
sections.content: When approaching calculus problems, follow these steps: 1. Read the problem carefully, 2. Determine which concepts apply, 3. Set up the problem, 4. Solve step by step, 5. Check your answer.
